qa_list.question: Who was honored by the American Volleyball Coaches Association (AVCA) as All-Region?
What is Isabella Sierra's major and how does she balance it with her volleyball career and sorority life?
qa_list.answer: Isabella Sierra has a double major in Business Administration and Psychology. She balances her academic responsibilities by managing her time effectively, prioritizing tasks, and seeking help when needed.

qa_list.question: How many Tartans were recognized for their academic achievements during the fall semester?
What event did the Department of Athletics hold to honor top academic athletes?
When was Lai honored by AVCA as All-Region and what is the context of this recognition?
qa_list.answer: Lai was honored on November 28, 2023. This recognition came from the American Volleyball Coaches Association (AVCA) for her outstanding performance in volleyball.

qa_list.question: What is the date of the article about Isabella Sierra balancing volleyball and sorority life?
How many Tartans were recognized on Volleyball and Football Academic All-District Teams?
What event did the Department of Athletics hold to honor top academic athletes at an annual celebration?
qa_list.answer: Department Honors Top Academic Athletes at Annual Celebration

qa_list.question: When was Lai honored by AVCA as All-Region and what is the context of this recognition?
qa_list.answer: Lai was honored on November 28, 2023. This recognition came from the American Volleyball Coaches Association (AVCA) for her outstanding performance in volleyball.

qa_list.question: What is the date of the article about Isabella Sierra balancing volleyball and sorority life?
What sport is being played in the text?
qa_list.answer: The sport being played in the text is volleyball.

qa_list.question: Who was playing against Carnegie Mellon in the first game mentioned in the text?
qa_list.answer: Carnegie Mellon's opponent in the first game was Geneseo.

qa_list.question: When did the second game take place?
qa_list.answer: The second game took place on Friday, September 8th.

qa_list.question: Who were Carnegie Mellon's opponents in their third and fourth games?
qa_list.answer: Carnegie Mellon played against #25 Christopher Newport in the third game and #10 Berry in the fourth game.

qa_list.question: Where did Carnegie Mellon play their fifth game?
qa_list.answer: The fifth game was played at Juniata College.

qa_list.question: Who were Carnegie Mellon's opponents in the sixth and seventh games?
qa_list.answer: Carnegie Mellon faced Point Park University in the sixth game and #1 Juniata in the seventh game.

qa_list.question: When did Carnegie Mellon play their eighth game?
qa_list.answer: The eighth game took place on Tuesday, September 12th.

qa_list.question: Who were the opponents of Carnegie Mellon in the ninth and tenth games?
qa_list.answer: Carnegie Mellon played against Mount Union University in the ninth game and Westminster (Pa.) College in the tenth game.

qa_list.question: When did Carnegie Mellon play their eleventh game?
qa_list.answer: The eleventh game took place on Saturday, September 16th.

qa_list.question: Who were the opponents of Carnegie Mellon in the twelfth and thirteenth games?
qa_list.answer: Carnegie Mellon played against Nazareth College in the twelfth game and John Carroll University in the thirteenth game.

qa_list.question: When did Carnegie Mellon play their fourteenth game?
qa_list.answer: The fourteenth game took place on Friday, September 15th.
